thread.title: Manchester City transfer news: Athletic Bilbao’s Aymeric Laporte set to be targeted in summer bid
thread.title_full: Manchester City transfer news: Athletic Bilbao’s Aymeric Laporte set to be targeted in summer bid

author: tgannon
title: Manchester City transfer news: Athletic Bilbao’s Aymeric Laporte set to be targeted in summer bid
text:
5 Athletic Bilbao defender Aymeric Laporte remains on Manchester City’s radar ahead of the summer transfer window 
Laporte’s new contract included a £55m buy-out clause, which would see his fee equal that of record City signing Kevin De Bruyne. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news , gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
But that has not put off Pep Guardiola who, according to the Daily Mirror , sees Laporte as a long-term partner for John Stones. 
The 22-year-old Bilbao star cast doubts over his future at the club in December by admitting he will “study offers” to leave. 
Laporte has made 28 appearances in all competitions for Bilbao this season. Getty Images Frenchman Aymeric Laporte signed a new contract at Athletic Bilbao in the summer which includes a £55million buy-out clause Getty Images Pep Guardiola sees Aymeric Laporte as the perfect defender to partner John Stones
